name: Lifestyle, Mental Health, Rela
what_you_do: DECODING 40 is a podcast that addresses the issues and experiences of grown men, providing insights and discussions relevant to their lives.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves adult men who are navigating various life challenges and experiences, focusing on personal growth and mental health.
business_focus: DECODING 40 is a podcast that addresses the issues and experiences of grown men, providing insights and discussions relevant to their lives. (lifestyle, mental health)
